p: Chemical composition. Essential oil (limonene and α-terpineol as major components) ( Mahalwal and Ali, 2003); flavonoids (e.g., hesperidin, hesperetin, naringenin) ( Abad-García et al., 2012; Parhiz et al., 2015); phenolic acids (e.g., p-cumaric, ferulic, quinic acids and derivatives) ( Abad-García et al., 2012), coumarins and furanocoumarins; vitamin C ( Klimek-Szczykutowicz et al., 2020).
